item.title: Introduction to the UVM
item.description: Introduction to the UVM When I was getting into UVM (Universal Verification Methodology) as my verification framework or methodology, I faced many difficulties. So I decided to make an article for beginners or intermediate people who do not have a clear picture of the UVM.Â I am not going to explain the history of UVM here. Because intermediate people are more like to know the theories other than the history lesson.
